title: Resurrected 'E.T.' Atari Games Fetch Thousands On EBay
teaser: Atari games that have been uncovered in a New Mexico landfill have sold for more than $37,000 dollars on eBay so far. One of the buyers explains why he paid hundreds of dollars for what is essentially 30-year-old garbage.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
